description:
PSA: This Course will no longer be available June 30th 2016 onwards
                            Coursera announced that they will be shutting off their old platform on June 30th. Over  400 courses that are part
                                of the old stack will be no longer be available. You can find the  complete list here.
                            
                            

                            
                                Read this guide to learn how to download this course before the old platform shuts down. 

                                The guide provides two ways to download the courses - Chrome Plugin and Python Script. Depending on which method you use, check the appropriate sections below for further details.
                            
                            
                            
                                To download this course you need to be enrolled in the course.
                                                                Unfortunately this course is closed for enrollment to new students. If you hadn't signed up before, you will not be able to download the course.
                                

                                                            

                            Chrome Plugin

                                                                If you had signed up for this course you will be able to download and save the course materials using the chrome plugin. Click on Go To Class and Log in to your Coursera account to do so.
                            
                            Python Script
                            
                                                                For the python script to work you will need a class name. Pick one from below:
                                                                    tradhealingbody-001
                                
                                
                                If more than one class name below, pick the last one. If the script fails, pick the one above that and try again. Not all of these class names are guranteed to work.


                            






                        
                    
                    The instructor will present a welcome video describing
the course syllabus followed by a Power Point presentation on the topic of
"Curanderismo," traditional/folk medicine.



Each thematic module will consist of an average of two
20-minute videos, by well-known traditional healers from Mexico, and the United
States.  Some of the hands-on
demonstrations will be followed by additional readings and discussions on
effectiveness of traditional and holistic medicine, which has been revived and
recently gained popularity throughout the world.  There will be a translator in the videos for the
healers from Mexico who speak Spanish.

                                            Syllabus
                        Instructor:  Dr. Eliseo “Cheo” Torres, from the University
of New Mexico  
Description:  This course will provide information on the
  history, traditions, rituals, herbs, and remedies of Curanderismo, a folk
healing tradition of the Southwestern United States, Latin America and Mexico. 
Optional  texts:  

Curandero: A Life in Mexican Folk Healing, Eliseo Torres & Tim Sawyer
Healing with Herbs & Rituals: A Mexican Tradition, Eliseo Torres, edited by Tim Sawyer
Infusions of Healing, Joie Davidow

For further references on Curanderismo, students are encouraged to read the following books:

Curandero Conversations: El Niño Fidencio, Shamanism and Healing Traditions of the Boderlands, Antonio Zavaleta
  Border Medicine - A Transcultural History of Mexican American Curanderismo, Brett Hendrickson



Week 1 - 3/30 – 4/5Introduction to
  Curanderismo PowerPoint PresentationVideo discussion of
  Curanderismo in Mexico and the U.S. Medicinal Plants of the Southwest
  - Plantas Medicinales del suroeste
  
  
 
 
  
  Week 2 - 4/6 – 4/12Tinctures and Microdosis - Tinturas
  y microdosisJuice Therapy - Jugo
  Terapia
  
  
 
 
  
  Week 3 - 4/13 – 4/19Mayan
  Acupuncture (Acupuntura Maya)
  
 
 
  
  
  
  
  Mayan
  Abdominal Massage (Masaje Maya Abdominal)
  
 
 
  
  Week 4 - 4/20 – 4/26Spinal
  Alignment
  
 
 
  
  
  
  
  Body
  Adjustment
  
 
 
  
  Week 5 - 4/27 – 5/3Shawl Alignment –
  Manteadas
  Healing
  Through Water (Hidroterapia)
  
 
 
  
  Week 6 - 5/4 – 5/10Geotherapy – Using the earth
  for healing
  
 
 
  
  
  
  
  
  Firecupping – Ventosas 
  
 
 
  
  Last day of course:
  May 10th, 2015
title: Curanderismo Part 1: Traditional Healing of the Body
